name: hospital-queue-management
description: Hospital Queue Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run start
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && set REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8001 && npm start

author: Hospital Queue Team
